description:
Add 1 dle.
Add option for favorites grid view.
You should be able to middle-click favorites again.

Add 22 dles. Remove 4 dles.
You can now hide specific dles.
You can now mark dles as completed for the day.
Add the section NEW.
Redesign changelog and favorites to be much cleaner.
Add 4 dles. Remove 3 dles. Add Discord server.

Add 18 dles.
Remove 2 dles.
Major design update with a more blocky feel.
Add new header buttons with their own panels.
Add settings panel that allows you to hide sections and categories, as well as change category ordering.
Add polls. (Experimental)
Add My Book Picks section.
Add ability to import and export favorites.

dles removed.name: Geocircles
dles removed.reason: No longer available due to API costs.

description:
Remove 1 dle.
Update Circuits, which is now part of Puzzmo.

Add favorites to the main page.
You can now quickly add/remove favorites by pressing the heart icons next to each dle.
Add one extra column to larger screens.
Move the Miscellaneous category to the left column to give more space to Words for the far right column.

dles removed.name: Toppled

description: Fix bug where DLES of the week could not be favorited.
